original_title: Vilanova Artigas - O Arquiteto e a Luz
overview: The documentary 'Vilanova Artigas: the architect and the light' rebuilds the life of the brazilian architect João Batista Vilanova Artigas. His relatives, friends, students and six of his major works tell the history of this iconic latinamerican modernist.
title: Vilanova Artigas - O Arquiteto e a Luz
